net.fabbrication.graph
Class SimpleTreeGenerator

java.lang.Object
  net.fabbrication.graph.SimpleTreeGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphModelGenerator
public class SimpleTreeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphModelGenerator

First example Graph Model Generator class. Generates and draws acyclic (tree) graphs with randomly distributed or constant vertex degrees.

Author:
Aaron Fabbri

getVertexCoords

protected java.util.ArrayList getVertexCoords(int level,
                                              int num_children,
                                              net.fabbrication.graph.VertexShape parent)
Determine locations for num_children vertices, which will be children of parent.

Parameters:
num_children - Number of vertices to generate coords. for.
level - Current level in the graph. 0 == root.
parent - Parent vertex or null.
Returns:
List of Point coordinates for vertices
